title: Tokyo Babylon, Vol. 1
description: Tokyo. The cultural and economic hub of the Eastern world. Not unlike the legendary city of Babylon, its man-made tower stretches toward the heavens ... a symbol of its people's ambition and their indomitable spirit. Nowhere on Earth will you find such vanity ... or such beauty.This is my home.My name is Sumeragi Subaru, and I hunt the dead. Then I return them to peace.No matter where my work leads me, I suspect I'll never leave Tokyo in spirit. But then again, it seems so few people do these days ...
author: Clamp
